name: consultprevbackend
description: Backend for ConsultaniaPrev Solution using serverless and micrservices architectures in AWS

scripts.build-all: npm run test-all && npm run build-activities && npm run build-complaints && npm run build-documents && npm run build-financial && npm run build-institution && npm run build-messages && npm run build-news && npm run build-people && npm run build-retirement
scripts.package: npm run build-all && aws cloudformation package --template-file ./resources/masterstack.yml --s3-bucket grstavares-code-us-east-1 --output-template-file ./resources/packaged.yml --profile backenddev
scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file ./resources/packaged.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --profile backenddev --stack-name

author: Gustavo Tavares
